title: GHL - High Converting Funnels
job_overview:
We're looking for a reliable and creative Virtual Assistant to support a growing real estate and housing business that helps families secure land and place manufactured homes on it. If you're skilled in Go High Level (GHL), comfortable running Facebook/Meta ads, and have a knack for building simple, high-converting funnels, we want to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities
Set up and manage Meta (Facebook) ad campaigns to generate qualified leads

Build and optimize funnels using Go High Level (GHL)

Assist with campaign management and automation

Support data mining and lead research for new prospects

Help set up and build out social media presence

Create and edit light content using Canva (images, basic visuals)

Ideal Candidate Traits
Creative and resourceful

Problem-solver who takes initiative

Transparent and honest communicator

Highly organized and detail-oriented

Able to follow direction and ask questions when needed

Comfortable working independently and collaboratively

Tools & Platforms
Go High Level (Required – Intermediate to Advanced)
 
Facebook/Meta Ads

Canva

Google Workspace

Social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram)

Slack & Zoom (for communication)

Role Details
Type: Part-Time 

Schedule: Monday–Friday, 6:00 PM–10:00 PM EST

To Apply:
Please submit the following:

Your updated resume

A 60–90 second video introducing yourself and your experience with GHL and digital ads

(Optional) Samples of funnels, ad campaigns, or visuals you've worked on

We're looking for someone who can help create consistent lead flow and be a valuable long-term asset to the team. If this sounds like you, apply now!

Application title: I am the one!
